mapper.insert: insert into sys_user ( nickName, avatarUrl, openId, unionId, gender, city, province, country, recentdate ) VALUES ( #{nickName}, #{avatarUrl}, #{openId}, #{unionId}, #{gender}, #{city}, #{province}, #{country}, #{recentdate} )
insert into sys_comment ( parentid, markerid, openid, comment, inserttime, replyopenid ) VALUES ( #{parentid}, #{markerid}, #{openid}, #{comment}, #{inserttime}, #{replyopenid} )

insert into sys_information ( openid, description, images, latitude, longitude, iconpath, location, title, recentdate ) VALUES ( #{openid}, #{description}, #{images}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{iconpath}, #{location}, #{title}, #{recentdate} )
